recipesJson.name: Stone Fruit Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: NeuerTK
recipesJson.description: I thank u/ID10-t for this recipe he gave me in the suggest a recipe thread a few months ago.  Was a good peach n cream flavour. I added FA White Peach because the fruit flavour I found faded over time. The original had a weird mouthfeel to it, Can't explain it, but adding CAP Marshmallow smoothed it out and I really liked the flavour it added to the mix.
